channel.title: Getting this error when running server
channel.description:
I have a windows VPS and i get this error when running the server.bat!Please help
[2/21/15 6:05 PM]: Loaded Project-Rolex successfully! [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: java.net.BindEx ception: Address already in use: bind [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Net.java:436) [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Net.java:428) [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketC hannelImpl.java:214) [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdapt or.java:74) [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [2/21/15 6:05 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)

item.title: Getting this error when running server
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

You already have something running in java. Cntrl + alt + delete, task manager and close whatever is using javaw in processes. Then try and run it.

Read full topic
